content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Historians speak of the rise of mass politics in the period from 1880 to 1914. Definet his phenomenon and analyze its effects on European politics in this period.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
